full_summary:
**Drinking Water & Wastewater Data Management System**
=============================================

**Tender Reference:** cb-999-48309972
**Publication Date:** January 18, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** February 2, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST

**Objective:**
Correctional Service Canada (CSC) requires a web-based drinking water and wastewater data management system to support effective water quality monitoring and compliance with regulatory requirements.

**Key Features:**

* Web-based system accessible from standard web browsers and internet access
* Fully functional in English and French
* Secure data storage and management with physical location within Canada
* Real-time alerts and notifications for non-compliance and missing data
* Customizable data reporting and alerts to meet CSC's specific needs
* Integration with existing software and IT equipment

**Deliverables:**

* Drinking water and wastewater data management system with three hierarchical levels of user access
* Customizable data reporting templates for various levels of the system
* Electronic worksheets for data entry and tracking
* Automatic alerts and notifications for non-compliance and missing data
* Integration with existing software and IT equipment

**Technical Requirements:**

* System must be able to export and back up data for a 12-month period after contract end date
* System must allow importation of existing data and integration of historical laboratory and operational data
* System must contain drinking water quality and wastewater standards/guidelines for all provinces
* System must allow for customization of data reporting and alerts

**Contract Period:**

* Contract duration: 3 years with options for 2 additional 1-year periods
* Expected start date: March 1, 2024
* Expected end date: February 28, 2027

**Contact Information:**

* Jason St-Onge, Contracting Authority
* Email: [jason.st-onge@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:jason.st-onge@csc-scc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (506) 269-3765

**Procurement Information:**

* Procurement category: SRV
* Procurement method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Tendering procedure: All interested suppliers may submit a bid

**Language of Tender:**

* Official languages: English or French

Note: All technical specifications, requirements, and details can be found in the attached solicitation document and associated files.
